reversi.game.reversi

Class ReversiEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • reversi.game.reversi.ReversiEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Evaluator

    public class ReversiEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Evaluator
    This evaluator evaluates the Reversi game situation by giving values to one's own pieces based on their position on the board. Corners are most valuable, and places next to corners have negative value. Sides are the second best place to be. After certain amount of moves are played, does not give different weights to different positions anymore.

    • Method Detail

      • eval

        public int eval(java.lang.Object game)
        Returns positive number value for game situations that are good for white and negative values for situations that are good for black. The bigger the absolute value of the number is, the better it is for that player.
        Specified by:
        eval in interface Evaluator
        Parameters:
        game - object of the type Game
        Returns:
        evaluated value of the game situation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given game is not type Reversi
